showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I walked over to shower side, 2 bathrooms still dirty which means avail toilets without any problem. No one waiting on shower. Asked to use one of those toilets. Lady at front desk said flat out no. For absolutely no reason. I was nice ‚Ä¶
The team was stellar greeting us with a warm welcome. The shower was amazing and was our first ever at any Pilot. Thank you all very much! See you again!!!!

Very nice Pilot location! CLEAN shower, and a decent amount of truck parking. Pretty quiet here on this Sunday night. Would assume it‚Äôs much busier on a weeknight. Will make a habit of stopping here more often for sure üëç ‚Ä¶

This was the cleanest Pilot I have been to. The shower was spotless. Not a hair, no dust hiding behind the doors, the fan was spotless. The store was extremely clean and the staff was super friendly and appreciated your business!!! The fuel ‚Ä¶

They're always clean when I've been there. So when I was an over the road driver they were always my first choice to stay at and get a shower. I personally think they have the best coffee.

Won't be stopping at this place any more !!!! Showers .... Floor wet an attendant took mop from shower to shower. Subway .... 1/2 star. Then to top it off went to buy a cold drink an cashier thought her phone was more important than my ‚Ä¶

Great experience! Great manager! Really clean truck stop and very clean shower. Quick and friendly. Although the computer messed up and put 2 people in a shower and was realized before the worst thing happend. The manager made sure I had a ‚Ä¶

This pilot has cleanest pumps and bays in the whole US network even one in Canada 30 minutes ahead of Buffalo NY is not this clean. The newest pumps machines are usually dirty. To keep it clean there are dedicated team members working around the clock. We appreciate it
The team was stellar greeting us with a warm welcome. The shower was amazing and was our first ever at any Pilot. Thank you all very much! See you again!!!!
Good location, friendly staff, nice selection of food and trucker needs, and also very clean restrooms!

This place is great! The women's restrooms are so warm and clean. They have two types of soap even! Really appreciate as a woman stopping to get gas and snacks at such a nice clean place! Employees all said hi or smiled too :)

showerReviews.reviewText: I liked the options to buy a lot. The shower was less than desirable. Water was hot, water pressure was good, the water stunk. There was no exhaust fan.... How can you expect the floor, walls, and ceilings to dry???

‚Ä¶ out the place was a massive truck stop. I haven't used the shower to be able to say how they stack up but the restrooms are always well maintained and actually quite nice looking. There's a wide variety of food, alcohol, and ‚Ä¶

Great place. I eat, shower, play pool and sometimes sleep there. Amazing people and Amazing place.

Truck stop and shower very nice an clean.good place to stop.boycot the McDonald's though shut lobby down early want serve a truck driver that walks up through drive thru.ill never buy anything from this McDonald's.hey you are inside a truck ‚Ä¶

I was really needing a place to park for the night...around 10 pm I stumbled upon Gallops in Goshen, IN., and boy was I happy to find it. Best shower I've seen in 40 years, better than any motel I've been in. Huge store, and selection. McDo ‚Ä¶

This is an awesome gas station inside. We love to stop in just to check stuff out & usually end up getting something. Staff aren't the most friendly and shower prices are a bit higher than Love's just down the road.

showerReviews.reviewText: The grounds are clean & well maintained.   I had phone signal before pulling in & immediately after pulling out but not while parked.  This typically means signal is blocked.  This is unsafe.
Plenty of room to park when it‚Äôs late. A few Porta Potties would be nice though since Truck Drivers have to use the bathroom too.
One of my favorite stops.  No restrooms or any facilities whatsoever.  There are a few garbage dumpsters.  Lots of room for parking
Plenty of parking at all times it seems, some bathrooms would be great and some dumpsters also

The place had many many places to park was very clean lots of trash can receptacles and a very close to Chicago Detroit Toledo and Indianapolis and maybe even Cincinnati a good place to park and a safe place to park
It is what it is and not much else. No restrooms, no vending only a dumpster. It's just a place to park.
No facilities. They repaved it this spring so the ruts are gone, for now. Unfortunately drivers dump trash, urine bombs, and bags of fences along the edges. Be very careful!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be
